text:
The textual description and examples of the ScriptAlias directive only handle directories, but it also supports mapping to a certain CGI script. The info about Alias suffers likewise, but script file aliases are more probable than generic file aliases.

Also, in the CGI Tutorial at <http://httpd.apache.org/docs/2.2/howto/cgi.html#moreinfo> RFC 3875 (CGI/1.1) should be mentioned and linked to, the draft at golux.com is no longer available.

This also applies to all versions prior to 2.2.
creator: bugzilla@crissov.de
